name: Jquery.dob
body:
#Demo #Getting Started dOb.js is a dropdown menu to choosing your date of birthday. It getting start as following : 
$("#myBirthDate").dOb({
	from_Y: 1911,	//from year(default: 1911)
	to_Y: 6, 	//to year(default: 10)
	digi: 2		//display digits(default: 2)
});
$("element").dOb();

Getting start the plugin


from_Y: 1911 (starting from 1911)

From which year


to_Y: 6 (to 6 years ago of this year)

To which year


digi: 2 (least 2 digits display)

Padding zero in front of digits


#Document HTML format as following :
`
`
``

``

``

`
`
* Select id ( dOb_Y, dOb_M and dOb_D ) can not be changed. * The default value ( Year, Month and Day ) is fill in the field directly. * If the default value is unnormal, auto convert the date of the first set. * You can set non-numeric to default. ex."----" or blank.

dOb ========= ### jQuery.dOb project #### Describe dOb is a date of birth plugin. #### Type Frontend Plugin #### Feature 1. easy to use. 2. dropdown menu. #### Base on Javascript, JQuery #### License under the MIT License Copyright(c) 2013 Shawn Wu
